Title: Advertising
Description: ![]() i recently browsed the Microsoft store as you do from time to time but after leaving i have found that annoying adverts have started to appear at the bottom of the screen even though i use ad blocker software along with anti track and they seem to be coming from Microsoft ? question anyone else having this ?
EnhancedContent: i recently browsed the Microsoft store as you do from time to time but after leaving i have found that annoying adverts have started to appear at the bottom of the screen even though i use ad blocker software along with anti track and they seem to be coming from Microsoft ? question anyone else having this ?
Author: MaxineWaters
